src.main

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • src.main.Main

  • public class Main
extends javafx.application.Application
    the Main class takes care of the Stages loginStage: the stage that is used for login screen registerStage: the stage that is used for sign up screen token: current user's token
